data.message: What's with these alt-righties becoming rappers all of a sudden and spamming poorly written rhymes on every Eminem related thread?

replies.message: YES!!! I wondered the same thing! For hating him so much now, they sure do want him to hear their rhymes! 😂
and they don't realise they're only helping him by commenting .. retards 😂
Whats with all the righteous libtard celebrities trying to become political mouthpieces.   Its been 11 months.   You GOTTA stop crying sometime.
^ Bet these 2 dudes are totally rooting for Kid Rock in the process. 😂

We're not butt hurt...but we are disappointed!  I can care less what he believes, but let's say the roles were reversed and he said FUCK YOU because you are an OBAMA supporter, which you probably are....what would be your response?  He'd probably be called a racist!
Most of these raps I am seeing in the posts are 10x better than that garbage cypher. Dudes washed up. Move on man. Go into strictly producing or some shit.

He drew a line in the sand he told you if you didn't politically agree with him then the f*** off he didn't want you as a fan all these people are doing is telling you okay you didn't want me as a fan f*** off same thing happened to the NFL and they lost 33% income in one week, how many people do you think are going to release his new record free to the public by hacking into it so he doesn't make any money?

It's a lot easier to hurt a famous person in their checkbook and he just said himself up for that.
Might have something to do with him selling out to the establishment which he has always been against till now.
Typical crackhead siding with another crackhead.
Lol people implying you're a liberal Hillary supporter
Jayden Rico Dela Cruz little do they know lmao
Alt Right is the new Center son
Yeah these raps I'm seeing here in the comments be saltier than take out fries
Like don't label something as a cypher when it is just wordplay with no beat. It was literally just a political message. Should have labeled it as a public service announcement or something
Sad thing is that some of them are better than what Eminem has produced in over a decade.
Not alt-right at all. Just a very disappointed moderate. No artist should ever diss their fans like that imo, especially over politics.
Hey azab go back to Arabia where you belong I 'll write a rap song any time I want whatya gonna do about it nuthin so shut your mouth
